nodes.text: A Dark Jedi apprentice was sent to the planet Yabosta along with some Rodian thugs to eliminate an agent of Jedi Master Niquon. Unknown to her masters, the agent was actually a Jedi Padawan. The Dark apprentice watched the Padawan's movements on the planet before eventually attacking him. Unfortunately for the apprentice, the technician Lowghen Badra helped the Jedi escape.
This apprentice was not particularly competent. She was sent to Yabosta instead of another apprentice, Von Totha, because her masters did not realize that Nason Laric was a Jedi Padawan.
